query:
ALTER TABLE backup_schedules 
ADD COLUMN emailOnSuccess INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 AFTER lastRunBackupId,
ADD COLUMN emailOnFailure INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 AFTER emailOnSuccess,
ADD COLUMN notificationEmails TEXT AFTER emailOnFailure;
